price: ߒ߬ߓߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ( ߡߊ߬ߘߐ߲߬ߠߌ߲ ) ߏ߬ ( ߕߙߐߦߊ ) ߡߊߜߙߏ߬ ߡߎߣߎ߲߬ ߸ ߓߊ ߕߊ ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ ߟߋ߫ ߛߌ߰ߣߍ߲߫ ߓߊ߲߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߢߍ߫
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمۡ فَذُوقُوهُ وَأَنَّ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: dhālikum fadhūqūhu wa-anna lil'kāfirīna ʿadhāba al-nāri
